entry.title: CTV BIP review
entry.summary: In an email exchange, Billy Tetrud thanked Eric Lombrozo for correcting factual errors regarding BIP8 and ST activation methods. While characterizing BIP8 and ST as either BIP9-based or not is subjective, the central issue remains whether activation requires majority hash power support or not. BIP9/ST requires this support, while BIP8 does not. The conversation on activation methods should be kept separate from advocating for specific methods in BIPs. Separation of concerns would reduce noise in conversations.
